abstract: The families of BBC staff members in Iran say they have been subject to arrest, harassment and intimidation since the broadcast of a documentary about Iran's supreme leader.
snippet: The families of BBC staff members in Iran say they have been subject to arrest, harassment and intimidation since the broadcast of a documentary about Iran's supreme leader.
lead_paragraph: The families of BBC staff members in Iran say they have been subject to arrest, harassment and intimidation by Iranian officials since the broadcast of a documentary about Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, on the British broadcaster's Persian-language service last month.

headline.main: Iran Intensifies Campaign of Intimidation Against BBC, Broadcaster Says
